content:
TWIST 99 will be held at the University of California, Irvine (UCI). UCI is 10 minutes/4 miles from the Orange County/John Wayne Airport. It is 1 hour - 1 hour 30 minutes (depending on traffic)/45 miles from LAX.

The workshop will be held in the McDonnell Douglas Auditorium.

Directions and printable maps of UCI (including the McDonnell Douglas Auditorium, building #311 and the surrounding area are available. A map and parking information will be mailed to you upon registration.




The following hotels have rooms available for the nights of August 18, 19 and 20.
These hotels are 3-5 miles from UCI.
Irvine Marriott
18000 Von Karman Ave.
Irvine, CA 92612
Phone: +1 800-228-9290
Fax: +1 949-261-7059
 
$125.00 per night
Rate available on an
if-available basis only
Located in the Koll Business Center just off I-405. One-half mile to Orange County/John Wayne airport. Free shuttle service to and from John Wayne airport and UCI, by arrangement. Parking: max. $9.00 per day for self parking or $7.00 for overnight. Valet parking also available.
Country Side Inn & Suites
325 Bristol Street
Costa Mesa, CA 92626
Phone: +1 800-322-9992
Fax: +1 714-662-0828
 
$89.00* per night
Rate available until 08/02.
*includes breakfast buffet
Located on Bristol Street South, on the corner of Bristol and Redhill. 1 mile from Orange County/John Wayne airport. Free shuttle service to and from John Wayne airport, by arrangement. Free parking at the hotel.
Crowne Plaza Hotel
17941 Von Karman Ave.
Irvine, CA 92614
Phone: +1 949-863-1999
Fax:+1 949-474-7236
 
$89 per night
Rate available until 08/02

Located on Von Karman Avenue just off of the I-405. 1 mile from Orange County/John Wayne airport. Free shuttle service to and from John Wayne airport. Parking: $6.00 per day at the hotel.
Orange County Airport Hilton
18800 MacArthur Blvd.
Irvine, CA 92612
Phone: +1 800-233-1234
Fax: +1 949-833-3317
 
$89.00 per night
Rate available until 08/02.
Adjacent to Orange County/John Wayne airport, 40 miles from LAX. Free shuttle service to and from Orange County/John Wayne airport and UCI, by arrangement. Parking: $3.00 per day for self parking. Valet parking also available.
Hyatt Regency
17900 Jamboree Road
Irvine, CA 92614
Phone: +1 949-975-1234
Fax: +1 949-852-1574
 
$119 per night -
the UCI rate

Rooms on an if-available basis only.
You must indicate you are attending
a UCI event.
Located on Jamboree Road adjacent to the I-405, just 1.5 miles from John Wayne/Orange County airport. Valet parking is available.
You must make reservations with the hotel directly. Indicate you are attending TWIST99 at UCI.

Hotel room rates are subject to applicable state and local taxes. The rate and availablity after the date listed above are at the discretion of the hotel and are not guaranteed.

Aileen R. Broccardo
Information and Computer Science
University of California, Irvine
Irvine, CA 92697-3425
Phone: +1 (949) 824-1357
Fax: +1 (949) 824-1715

Irvine Research Unit in Software
Information and Computer Science
University of California, Irvine
Irvine, CA 92697-3425
